TestCase.TestCaseObjective: The objective of this test is to assess the ability of consumers and producers to handle large MIP4 payloads and messages (quantity checking).
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: A Producer/Provider publishes / responds with one / multiple MIP4 valid messages making a particular size. The Consumer receives and processes them into their system.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: All.
TestCase.TestCaseInput: Validated means to acquire information from the Producer using a MIP4 exchange pattern.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: Consumers and producers can handle large MIP4 payloads and messages.
TestCase.TestCaseOutput: The Consumer successfully acquires content from the Producer and is able to apply it to their system without error.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Produce one valid 80MB MIP4 message or a set of them, making together an 80MB size (270K MIP4 typical messages roughly).
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The producer/provider publishes an 80MB sequence of valid MIP4 messages or is ready to respond them or send them as a file to the consumer.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Obtain the valid 80MB MIP4 content from the producer, all together once and for all.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Content will be received from the producer/provider.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Process all together once and for all, the 80MB MIP4 content on the Consumer.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: The Consumer will successfully process the MIP4 content without error.
